[`MarkdownPostProcessor`](../MarkdownPostProcessor) › [`sortOrder`](./sortOrder)

## MarkdownPostProcessor.sortOrder property

An optional integer sort order. Defaults to 0. Lower number runs before higher numbers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sortOrder?: number;
```
